week_1.title: Te Kete Ako - Week 1 Beta Feedback
week_1.description: Thank you for being a Founding Beta Teacher! Your Week 1 feedback helps us make Te Kete Ako exceptional. This takes 5 minutes.

questions.question: How easy was it to find what you needed?
options: Very difficult (couldn't find what I needed)

questions.question: Did you use any resources in your classroom this week?
options: Yes - reviewed but haven't taught yet
No - couldn't find what I needed

questions.question: If YES, which resource(s)? (Please list)
How was your first impression of the platform? (1-10)
Why this rating? What made you feel this way?
What worked brilliantly? ✨ (What made you go 'YES! This is exactly what I needed!')
What was frustrating or confusing? 😕 (What made you go 'Ugh, why isn't this easier?')
How much time did Te Kete Ako save you this week?
Would you use Te Kete Ako again next week?
Why?
Any features you wish existed?
Is there anything we should fix URGENTLY?
If yes, what's broken/urgent?
How likely are you to recommend Te Kete Ako to a colleague? (1-10)
If you could only improve ONE thing this week, what would it be?
OPTIONAL: Any success stories from using resources in class? (Student reactions, engagement, what worked well)
Can we contact you for a quick 10-minute chat this week?

week_2.title: Te Kete Ako - Week 2 Beta Feedback
week_2.description: Week 2! Thanks for continuing. Your feedback helps us improve.

questions.question: How many resources have you used in class?
What worked brilliantly this week?
What didn't work?
Any features you wish existed?
How much time did this save you?
Overall satisfaction (1-10)

week_3.title: Te Kete Ako - Week 3 Beta Feedback
week_3.description: Week 3! Getting into the rhythm. Your insights are gold!

questions.question: Has this become part of your routine?
Have you recommended to colleagues?
What would make you use it more?
Any technical issues?
Overall satisfaction (1-10)

week_4.title: Te Kete Ako - Week 4 Final Beta Feedback
week_4.description: Final week! Thank you for your incredible contribution. This is the big one!

questions.question: Overall rating for the entire beta experience (1-10)
Would you recommend to other teachers?
Best resource you used:
What should we prioritize next?
Testimonial (optional): Would you share a quote about your experience?
Can we feature you as a case study?
Any final thoughts or suggestions?
